message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and potential impact, I'm extending an exclusive offer to purchase it for $15000. This price reflects not only the product's worth but also the unique opportunity for you to secure it now.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. Based on my budget constraints, I am willing to pay up to $12000 for the product.
